abstract: Nine stories from the Mount Alexander region. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mount Alexander'.
description: The Shire of Mount Alexander is located in the central region of Victoria. These nine stories cover the towns Castlemaine, Newstead and Maldon. Locals from the region discuss living in the country, the reasons for choosing to living in these towns and the community spirit so crucial to the region's survival.
